name: Duolingo
description: Free interactive online course (incl. speaking and listening).

name: Memrise
description: Online learning tool for learning vocabulary (Flashcard-style).

name: Busuu
description: Interactive course with vocabulary training and possibility of interacting with native speakers for corrections in your exercises.

name: Quizlet
description: General app (with website option) that can be used to create flashcards or study through other people's sets. Includes games to make the flashcard study more entertaining.

name: Anki
description: Anki is a general-purpose flashcard app, but it's ideal for vocabulary study. It has an excellent
algorithm, which means that familiar words are asked less and less often, while words you struggle with come up frequently. It's a great supplement to Duolingo.

name: Tobo
description: Flashcard app with vocabulary groups. You can unlock the next groups by studying the previous ones. Includes learning, practicing, revising and games.
